sentences: Johanna Doderer (born 18 September 1969 in Bregenz) is an Austrian composer.
Doderer was born in 1969 in Bregenz, Austria.
Doderer learned her trade in Graz with Beat Furrer (composition), then later in Vienna with Klaus Peter Sattler (film and media composition) and Erich Urbanner (composition).
Her work was performed at the Embassy of Austria, Washington, D.C. by violinist Édua Zádory and the Momenta Quartet.
In December 2012 the University of Arts Graz (Austria) devoted an entire day to performances of Johanna Doderer's works.
Composer in Residence 2004/2005, Wiener Concertverein
